text: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo! is a kids' mystery TV series aired on Cartoon Network and Boomerang. It's in the Scooby-Doo media franchise. == Story == 4 teenagers (Fred, Daphne, Velma, and Shaggy) are on their last high school summer vacation together. They decide to travel in their Mystery Machine (the name of their van) along with their talking brown dog, Scooby-Doo. However, monsters interrupt their exploration. They try to complete their journey anyways while also solving mysteries. == Cast == * Frank Welker as Scooby-Doo, and Fred * Matthew Lillard as Shaggy * Grey DeLisle-Griffin as Daphne * Kate Micucci as Velma ==References== Category:Scooby-Doo television series Category:Children's animated television series
title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
